products.name: deploy-arch-ibm-cos
products.label: Cloud automation for Object Storage
products.short_description: Creates and configures an IBM Cloud Object Storage instance and buckets
products.long_description:
[IBM Cloud Object Storage](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/cloud-object-storage) is a highly available, durable, and secure platform for storing unstructured data. You can choose from a few different variations to create a single instance or regional and cross-regional buckets.  

Leverage [Terraform IBM Modules](https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules) to shape and scale your solutions. You can integrate Terraform IBM Modules (TIM) to extend functionality and design a solution tailored to your environment and operations needs. These modules offer reusable, customizable elements that follow IBM Cloud's recommended practices. You can access the [source code and documentation](https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-cos) and use it to extend your current architecture or create new solutions.

ℹ️ This deployable architecture is a part of a larger collection that IBM provides. Each deployable architecture focuses on a single IBM Cloud service. You can use these deployable architectures on their own to automate deployments by following an [IaC approach](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/secure-enterprise?topic=secure-enterprise-understanding-projects), or you can [combine them together](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/secure-enterprise?topic=secure-enterprise-config-stack) to deploy a more complex end-to-end solution architecture.
products.support_details: This product is in the community registry, as such support is handled through the originated repo. If you experience issues please open an issue in this repository [here](https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-cos/issues). Please note this product is not supported via the IBM Cloud Support Center.

features.title: Object Storage instance
features.description: Creates and configures an IBM Cloud Object Storage instance.

features.title: Object Storage bucket
features.description: Optionally creates and configures regional and cross-regional buckets.

features.title: Key encryption
features.description: You can optionally choose to encrypt your data using default encryption keys, IBM Key Protect, or IBM Hyper Protect Crypto Services to have complete control over your encryption keys. [Learn more](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/cloud-object-storage?topic=cloud-object-storage-encryption).

features.title: Service credentials
features.description: Creates and and configures Object Storage service credentials for your instance. Optionally, you can configure [IBM Cloud Secrets Manager](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/secrets-manager?topic=secrets-manager-service-credentials&interface=terraform) to manage the service credentials.

features.title: Context-based restrictions
features.description: Optionally creates and configures [context-based restrictions](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/account?topic=account-context-restrictions-whatis) to control access to the instance and buckets.

features.title: Composable and Extensible Architecture
features.description: This architecture illustrates how Terraform IBM Modules(TIM) can be integrated to deliver a complete solution on IBM Cloud. Each module is a reusable, and validated component for security, compliance, and operational IBM best practices. You can deploy this architecture as-is or configure it as code by leveraging the underlying modules to fit your specific requirements. Explore the [source code and documentation](https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-cos) to adapt, extend, or create entirely new solutions using these building blocks.

flavors.label: Single instance (fully configurable)
flavors.name: instance
flavors.short_description: Ideal for users who want a Cloud Object Storage instance. A dedicated, highly scalable, durable, and secure environment for storing unstructured data.

iam_permissions.notes: Required to create an Object Storage instance.

features.description: Configured to use IBM secure-by-default standards, but you can edit it to fit your use case.

diagrams.description: This deployable architecture automates the deployment of an IBM Cloud Object Storage instance within an existing resource group, integrates with IBM Cloud Secrets Manager for secure credential storage, and supports IAM authorization policies, including context-based restrictions for enhanced security and compliance.

value_constraints.description: Prefix must begin with a lowercase letter and may contain only lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens '-'. It must not end with a hyphen('-'), and cannot contain consecutive hyphens ('--'). It should not exceed 16 characters
The value provided for 'existing_secrets_manager_instance_crn' is not valid.

flavors.label: Cross-regional bucket (fully configurable)
flavors.name: cross-regional-bucket-fully-configurable
flavors.short_description: Ideal for users who require superior disaster recovery and high availability by spreading data across multiple metropolitan areas, making it resilient to entire region failures. Encryption is flexible.

iam_permissions.notes: Required to create an Object Storage instance.
[Optional] Required if key encryption is enabled and Key Protect is used for bucket encryption.
[Optional] Required if key encryption is enabled and IBM Hyper Protect Crypto Services is used to encrypt the root key for bucket encryption.
[Optional] Required to create a Cloud Monitoring instance.
[Optional] Required if Cloud Monitoring is configured to collect platform metrics.

features.description: Configured to use IBM secure-by-default standards, but you can edit it to fit your use case.

diagrams.description:
This architecture deploys a cross-regional IBM Cloud Object Storage bucket with replication which ensures high availability and durability.
Integrated services such as key management services for encryption enhance security, while Activity Tracker Event Routing and Cloud Monitoring offer observability, ensuring resilient and secure cloud storage.

value_constraints.description: Prefix must begin with a lowercase letter and may contain only lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens '-'. It must not end with a hyphen('-'), and cannot contain consecutive hyphens ('--'). It should not exceed 16 characters

configuration.description: The name of an existing resource group to provision the resources.

value_constraints.description: The value provided for 'existing_cos_instance_crn' is not valid.
The value provided for 'monitoring_crn' is not valid.

configuration.description: When set to `true`, the IBM Cloud Monitoring instance is configured to collect platform metrics from the specified region. You can configure only one instance of the IBM Cloud Monitoring service per region to collect platform metrics in that location. Check with the account or service administrator if another Monitoring instance is already configured. You might not have permissions to see all monitoring instances in the region. [Learn more](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/monitoring?topic=monitoring-platform_metrics_enabling).

value_constraints.description: The value provided for 'existing_kms_instance_crn' is not valid.
The value provided for 'existing_kms_key_crn' is not valid.

dependencies.name: deploy-arch-ibm-cos
dependencies.description: Creates an Object Storage instance, where a bucket is provisioned.

dependencies.name: deploy-arch-ibm-kms
dependencies.description: Enables managed encryption with your own keys via IBM Cloud Key Protect. If disabled, services will default to IBM-managed encryption.

dependencies.name: deploy-arch-ibm-cloud-monitoring
dependencies.description: Enable IBM Cloud Monitoring to gain operational visibility into your Object Storage buckets.

flavors.label: Cross-regional bucket (security-enforced)
flavors.name: cross-regional-bucket-security-enforced
flavors.short_description: Ideal for users who require superior disaster recovery and high availability by spreading data across multiple metropolitan areas, making it resilient to entire region failures. Encryption is enabled.

iam_permissions.notes: Required to create an Object Storage instance.
[Optional] Required to create a Key Protect root key for bucket encryption.
[Optional] Required to create a Hyper Protect Crypto Services root key for bucket encryption.

features.description: Configured to use IBM secure-by-default standards that can't be changed.

diagrams.description:
This architecture deploys a cross-regional IBM Cloud Object Storage bucket with replication, ensuring high availability and durability.
Integrated services such as key management services for encryption enhance security, while Activity Tracker Event Routing and Cloud Monitoring offer observability, ensuring resilient and secure cloud storage.

flavors.label: Regional bucket (fully configurable)
flavors.name: regional-bucket-fully-configurable
flavors.short_description: Ideal for users who require data within one metro area, providing resilience to a single data center failure and flexible encryption.

iam_permissions.notes: Required to create an Object Storage instance.
[Optional] Required if key encryption is enabled and Key Protect is used for bucket encryption.
[Optional] Required if key encryption is enabled and IBM Hyper Protect Crypto Services is used to encrypt the root key for bucket encryption.
[Optional] Required to create a Cloud Monitoring instance.
[Optional] Required if Cloud Monitoring is configured to collect platform metrics.

features.description: Configured to use IBM secure-by-default standards, but you can edit it to fit your use case.

diagrams.description:
This architecture deploys a regional IBM Cloud Object Storage bucket across multiple availability zones with replication, ensuring high availability and durability.
Integrated services such as key management services for encryption enhance security, while Activity Tracker Event Routing and Cloud Monitoring offer observability, ensuring resilient and secure cloud storage.
